body: @eugeneswalker reported in #17892 that Faodel failed to build on NERSC Cori.  This has been resolved in https://github.com/faodel/faodel/issues/7.  This PR adds a patch file that is a backport of that fix to the Faodel 1.1906.1 release.
title: FAODEL: fix CMake failures on NERSC Cori in faodel@1.1906.1
